channel.title: CVE Feed for Wiesemann & Theis -- Com-Server ++
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Wiesemann & Theis -- Com-Server ++

item.title: CVE-2022-4098|2024-08-03T01:27:54.380Z -- wiesemann%20%26%20theis -- com-server%20%2B%2B
item.description: Multiple Wiesemann&Theis products of the ComServer Series are prone to an authentication bypass through IP spoofing. After a user logged in to the WBM of the Com-Server an unauthenticated attacker in the same subnet can obtain the session ID and through IP spoofing change arbitrary settings by crafting modified HTTP Get requests. This may result in a complete takeover of the device.
